title: Harper & Bright Designs House Bunk Beds with Slide and Stairs, Twin Over Twin Bunk Bed with Guardrail and Roof, Wood Bunk Bed Frame for Kids, Teens, Girls & Boys (New, Espresso)
features: [High-Quality Bunk Bed] -The bunk bed frame is constructed from selected solid pine wood and MDF and iron alloy bolts which keeps the whole bed sturdy and wobble free. The strengthened frame is capable of holding up to 250lbs on the top bunk and 300lbs on the bottom bunk. The bunk features upper bunk slats and lower bunk slats to help increase the longevity of your mattresses, no box spring is needed.

[House Bunk Bed with Storage Drawer] -This bunk bed has a twin size bed on the top and a twin size bed on the bottom, which can accommodate two people. It combines brackets, storage steps, and slides into one, saving space to the greatest extent. The two drawers located beneath the attached staircase provide ample storage for your toys and bedding.

[Creativity House Bed Frame] -This twin over twin bunk bed crafted with a whimsical playhouse design, comes with slide and storage steps, Perfect for girls and boys to make up their own theme, you can decorated the bed frame with ribbons, tent or lanterns on the eaves. The house bed is designed with a clean silhouette and a hue of elegance. It suits all styles of home decoration, and completes the look of any bedroom.

[Safe Design for Your Kids] -The house bunk bed offers extra fun to child, the 3-step Stairs is integrated into the frame design to ensure the utmost safety and security for your child as they navigate up and down during playtime or when getting ready for bed. the upper bunk has high rails to ensure secure and worry-free nights. the attached slide adds fun to child and meet their interactive play needs.

[Easy to Assembly Bunk Bed Frame] -Twin over twin bunk bed dimension: 94.2"L x 93.3"W x40.1"H. This wood bunk bed comes in 3 package with clear instructions and hardware, Easy to put together (mattress not included), Warranty time: One Year; 100% Customer Satisfaction; It will take 2-7 Days to Arrive; Please feel free to contact us if there is missing or damaged part during the process of shipping.
description: If you are choosing a multifunctional bunk bed, this will be your best choice,this twin over twin bunk bed can provide two people to rest. It has storage steps on the side and two drawers for storing items. You can put toys and odds and ends in it. There is a slide that can slide down directly from the upper bed, combining entertainment and practicality. Solid pine legs and a strong, durable frame ensures stability and durability for long-term use. Slat kit included so box springs are not required. This bunk bed is designed with a clean silhouette and a hue of elegance. It suits all styles of home decoration, and completes the look of any bedroom.
